definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: I. [[מלך]] (√ of foll.; mng. dub.; Thes comp. Ar. malaka possess, own exclusively, cf. Eth. malaka: so Bae:Rel. 144 (cf. [[בַּעַל]]), and Nö:ZMG xl.1886, 727; Lyon:Bib. Sacr., Apr. 1884 Dl:Prol. 30 al. comp. As. malâku, counsel, advise Dl:HWB 412, BH and NH [[מָלַךְ]] Aram. mlak, [[מְלַךְ]], whence king as orig. counsellor, he whose opinion is decisive).
